name: Video to mp3, mp2, aac or wav. Batch converter
description: This App allows you to pass the videos you have on your device to mp3, mp2, aac or wav audio format.  Features:  - Multiple videos can be selected at once for batch processing. - Launches a notification when the compression is complete. This option is configurable in the settings. - You can choose the bit rate and the conversion frequency. If you select the same it will remain with the same quality as in the video. - In the file selector you can see the thumbnails of the videos. - Converted files can be played directly without leaving the application to check their quality. - The selected videos can be previewed quickly from the application. - The app only takes 3.5 Mb. - You can edit the id3 tags of the created mp3 audios.
